newsitem.title: USA: AFTER THE BELL - Little activity after day's drop.
newsitem.headline: AFTER THE BELL - Little activity after day's drop.

text.p: Microsoft Corp was among several big technology companies trading after the bell on Thursday, but traders said in general the market was quiet after the Dow Jones index fell 140 points during regular hours.
"What a rollercoaster ride, huh?" said one trader, who added that most after-hours trades just represented minor adjustments in the wake of the day's big drop.
"It's a long weekend, nobody wants to go out with any position," he said.
Microsoft was up 3/8 to 94-1/8 in late trading, after losing1/2 a point during regular hours.
Cisco Systems Inc was trading down 1/4 to 50-3/4, after declining 1-3/8 during the day. Intel Corp was trading down 1/8 to 139, after falling 1-1/2 before the closing bell.
